profiles.Name: Bilal A.
profiles.Headline: Top Rated AI Specialist | Expert in Language Models & Computer Vision
profiles.Description:
🚀 PROFILE OVERVIEW

Welcome to the innovative realm of a seasoned AI expert and Founder of Brain.Ai. With over three years of deep industry experience, I specialize in Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Advanced Recommendation Systems. My career is dedicated to not just solving complex challenges but also to pushing the boundaries of what AI can achieve, revolutionizing the landscape with disruptive solutions.

💡 CORE EXPERTISE AND TECHNICAL SKILLS

Deep Learning and Neural Networks: Proficient in CNNs, RNNs, GANs, and Transformers using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras. I bring extensive experience in training models on large datasets, fine-tuning, and optimizing neural networks using advanced regularization and optimization techniques.
Computer Vision: Skilled in implementing state-of-the-art algorithms for object detection, segmentation, and tracking, using tools like OpenCV and Dlib. My projects include high-accuracy facial recognition systems and real-time image and video processing.
Natural Language Processing: A pioneer in advanced NLP techniques, leveraging models like BERT and Transformers for sentence vector embedding, topic modeling, and concept extraction. I lead projects that enhance understanding and generate innovative classification solutions.
Generative AI: From building context-aware virtual assistants to developing creative applications with GANs and VAEs, my expertise spans large and small language models, including GPT-3, tailored for diverse applications.
Speech and Music Synthesis: I am adept in technologies like WaveNet and DeepVoice for speech recognition, generation, and AI-driven music synthesis, focusing on feature extraction and audio processing.
Recommendation Systems: Architect of hybrid recommendation systems that blend content-based and collaborative filtering. My innovations offer personalized user experiences and market-focused solutions utilizing advanced techniques like matrix factorization.
🌐 PROJECTS AND INNOVATIONS

Revolutionary Computer Vision Applications: Developed several cutting-edge projects incorporating YOLO, U-Net, and ResNet technologies that redefine how visual information is processed and interpreted.
Advanced NLP Implementations: Led transformative NLP projects, setting new standards in text analysis and machine understanding.
AI-Driven Solutions at Brain.Ai: At the helm of Brain.Ai, I drive the development of innovative AI solutions that tackle real-world problems, from enhancing user experience in digital platforms to pioneering new ways of interaction through AI.
🚀 VISION AND MISSION

My mission is to transcend the typical boundaries of AI applications, diving deeper into unexplored territories of technology to redefine industries. Join me on this journey of discovery and innovation, where each project moves us closer to a future where AI enhances every aspect of human life.

🌟 RELATED SKILLS

Frontend and Backend Development: Skilled in React, Node.js, FastAPI, along with comprehensive knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases.
DevOps and Platform Management: Proficient in setting up CI/CD pipelines, utilizing cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, and Azure, ensuring robust, scalable AI solutions.

profiles.Name: John P.
profiles.Headline: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
profiles.Description:
I am a senior machine learning engineer at an AI real estate startup. I have had the pleasure of working in the machine learning space all 8 years of my professional career. I am passionate about building solutions that provide tangible value to the end customer. 


I began my AI career as a researcher at MIT Lincoln Laboratory. While at MIT LL, I worked on projects revolving around computer vision, NLP, and graph analytics. After MIT LL, I joined Avitas, GE venture as a computer vision engineer. Avitas flew drones around well pads and captured IR/RGB video and LiDAR data. My role was to develop solutions, mainly deep learning, to input the video/lidar data and facilitate inspection of the well pads. Baker Hughes bought Avitas. Shortly after, I joined FoxyAI as their first full time hire. Currently at FoxyAI, I oversee all AI development. 


Programming: Python, JavaScript/HTML/CSS, Java, Matlab
Machine Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Caffe
Computer Vision: OpenCV, Pillow, Image Generation (CLIP, DALLE, Dreambooth), YOLO, Mask-RCNN, LiDAR, 3D Reconstruction, SWIN-Transformer, OCR, UNET
Data Science: Numpy, Pandas, Scipy, Matplotlib, Seaborn
Misc: various AWS tools, Docker, MongoDB, FastAPI, Django, Flask, Git, Jira, UNIX tools/admin

profiles.Name: Mohsen N.
profiles.Headline: Statistics tutor in R | Excel | Minitab| Python
profiles.Description:
"I enjoyed lessons with him a lot. Excellent guy." client feedback for the project "Teach me language R".

"Great experience! Very knowledgeable and responsive. Adapted to changing requirements well." client feedback for the project "Statistician with R for thesis guidance and tutoring".

Studying of Statistics and R can be enjoyable and simple as proved from the feedbacks above. I have many certificates from top universities (Harvard, Johns Hopkins,....etc) in diverse skills as Statistics, R programming, Six Sigma, getting and cleaning data, data visualisation, and data analysis. I have taught R and Statistics to different Upwork clients and different fellows in the industrial and academic fields. You can see examples of my designed courses in the portfolio part. 

I have experience and can teach you the following fields:
Descriptive statistics to continuous, categorical, and time to event data.
Different probability distributions.
Confidence intervals and hypotheses testing (T-test, ANOVA, Chi-square, Kruskal-Wallis,.....etc).
Linear regression (simple and multiple).
Logistic regression (ordinal and nominal, simple and multiple).
Cox regression (simple and multiple).
Cluster analysis.
Importing and cleaning data into R.
Tidyverse packages of R (Readr, ggplot,....etc).
Data wrangling in R.
Data visualization in R using basic, lattice or ggplot packages.
Reproducible projects with R markdown.
Pivot tables, Pivot charts, and formulas in Excel.
Six Sigma tools (Different statistical tests, Control charts, Design of Experiments DOE,.....etc).
Different Statistical tests, control charts,.....etc in Minitab.
SQL basic functions.
Infographics

profiles.Name: Siddhant S.
profiles.Headline: AI Developer | Generative AI/ML | Langchain | GPT, LLAMA | LLMS | AWS
profiles.Description:
Experienced AI Full stack Developer specializing in NLP, ML, and LLMs, Python, Typescript🎓

Hello there! I am a seasoned AI professional with a focus on Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML), and Large Language Models (LLMs) and full stack development. With over 2 years of expertise in the field, I have successfully completed multiple jobs on Upwork, leaving my clients highly satisfied.

Here's what I bring to the table:

💡 Expertise: I specialize in NLP, ML, and LLM technologies, including GPT3, GPT-NeoX, and GPT-J. My skills extend to custom Chatbots using OpenAI, langchain, and vector databases like pinecone. I am proficient in working with transformer-based models, offering services in text classification, natural language understanding, natural language generation, sentiment analysis, text summarization, topic modeling, and data clustering.

🔧 Technical Proficiency: I have hands-on experience with various models such as Chatgpt, GPT4, Llama, Falcon, and more. I am adept at executing custom NLP solutions and integrating them seamlessly into business workflows. Additionally, I excel in training and fine-tuning open source LLMs like Llama, mpt7b, and Falcon, utilizing efficient techniques like QLora.

🚀 Innovative Solutions: If you're seeking assistance with semantic search, similarity search, or developing high-quality embeddings, I can create state-of-the-art semantic search systems using sentence transformers. My expertise ensures accurate and efficient search results tailored to your requirements.

💬 Conversational AI: Need a chatbot or conversational AI solution? I can help you develop cutting-edge solutions using Chatgpt, langchain, and vector databases. My proficiency extends to working with sequential data, time series forecasting, and PyTorch code debugging.

✨ Client Satisfaction: I have a proven track record of delivering exceptional results on Upwork. My clients have consistently praised my work, making me a reliable choice for your AI-related projects.

Whether you require assistance with GPT3, GPT-NeoX, GPT-J, or any other LLM, or if you need support with NLP, ML, or any related task, I am here to help. Don't hesitate to reach out—I am eager to contribute to the success of your project!"



**Why Me?**

- Worked with organizations to develop proprietary enterprise tools/platforms/bots
- Developed AI based SAAS MVPs
- 3+ years of Professional experience of working with MNCs and startups.
- Have prior professional experience of working on whatsapp/telegram bots that have scaled massively.
Developed a bot that takes user questions like Physics/Maths question and then provide solution within 10 seconds, based on OCR, NLP etc

= SITES AND DIRECTIONS TO SCRAPE =
🗂️ Sportsbook scraping (Pinnacle Sports, Bet365, Unibet, WilliamHill, MarathonBet, FanDuel, BetFair, ESPN, BetMGM, 188bet, PariMatch, FavBet etc.)

🏆 Software Development: Building custom-tailored software that aligns seamlessly with your business's specific needs.

🏆 Blockchain Data Analysis: Utilizing advanced analytics techniques to derive insights from blockchain data. Whether it’s for market research, trend analysis, or custom reporting, I can help you unlock the value hidden in the vast amount of data generated by blockchain transactions.

🧠 WHY ME?

profiles.Name: Taha A.
profiles.Headline: AI Engineer | Generative AI, LLMs, Computer Vision Expert | AI Infra
profiles.Description:
📌 I Convert Your Ideas into Profitable AI Apps & Products

📞 Have a potentially groundbreaking AI idea? Let's chat! I'll provide a realistic assessment of feasibility and propose the best path forward, ensuring you make a smart investment in your vision! 

✅ Delivered 70+ successful GenAI, Vision and App development projects for Enterprise, Startups and bootstrap founders
✅ Official OpenCV.org Contractor for 2+ years.
✅ Author of 3 reputed Courses, 1 book & 1 library on Computer Vision.
✅ 100% client satisfaction rate.

I'm a passionate AI Engineer with 7+ years of experience building innovative solutions for clients. I leverage my expertise in deeplearning, vision, GenAI(RAG, LLMs, chatbots and AI agents), large-scale AI Infra, and AI app development to deliver successful projects across various industries.

I have the Best blend of Industrial & Academic Experience in AI, from publishing high-end vision courses to coaching thousands of developers, researchers & engineers in AI, to working with leading AI corporations like OpenCV.org and BigVision.

Here are some services that I offer in AI Development:

💢 Comptuer Vision:

✔ Video Intelligence: Extract data or get insights from your videos, be it anomaly detection, action recognition, Monitoring or video analytics systems and Industrial vision systems
✔ Image Processing: From lightweight classical techniques to powerful deep learning methods.
✔ Deep Learning: Specialize in Object Detection, Image Classification, Image Segmentation, and Keypoint Detection (Pose | Face | Hands). Expertise in training state-of-the-art (SoTA) models tailored to your specific data requirements.
✔ OCR: Extract text from images and PDFs for further analysis and manipulation. Now powered with GenAI for maximum accuracy
✔ Design and build tailored Desktop, Mobile, and Web applications to host your AI solutions.
✔ Develop robust REST APIs to integrate AI functionalities seamlessly into your existing systems.
✔ Expert deployment of AI systems on platforms like Azure, GCP, AWS, Runpod or edge, ensuring scalable, secure, and efficient operations.

💢 GenerativeAI /LLMs / NLP:

✔ Smart Chatbots and Conversational Assistants: AI-driven chatbots for sales automation, lead generation, internal company knowledge bases, and much more, advanced speech-to-text (STT) and text-to-speech (TTS) functionalities to provide a seamless user experience across various platforms.

✅ Advanced LLM Finetuning and Optimization: Custom LLMs/ GPT3.5/ LLama finetuned on your data with advanced techniques like PEFT Finetuning and RLHF. Highly Optimized for longer context length, low inference cost and high speed

✅ Custom GenAI,RAG Agents and Automations for your internal workflows or your next SaaS app powered by domain knowledge and fully automated AI agents

✅ Enterprise GenAI Applications: End-toEnd automation of internal processes and workflows with Generative AI, focusing on creating secure and private systems where data privacy is paramount. Host and train your own LLMs for highest security and quality

✅ Large-Scale AI Infra Development: Design and implement large-scale AI infrastructures tailored to support extensive deployment of LLMs. Specialize in the seamless integration of AI technologies, ensuring high availability and performance for large-scale applications.

The Bleed AI Advantage:

1. Rapid Prototyping: We deliver initial results within weeks, focusing on your Minimum Viable Product (MVP).
2. Market-Driven Solutions: We consider market competition and business goals when building your AI product.
3. Real-World Value: Our success is measured by the business value your AI solution generates.

💡 Why Choose Me for Your Project?
🎯 Scalable Solutions: I build AI applications that can grow alongside your business without requiring significant code changes.
🎯 Deep-rooted Expertise: Anchored by a robust understanding of AI and machine learning, I bring to the forefront an extensive reservoir of knowledge and hands-on experience, ready to navigate the complexities of your project.
🎯 Reliable Delivery: My proven track record ensures your project is completed on time and within budget.
🎯 Clear Communication: I prioritize keeping you informed and involved throughout the entire development process.
🎯 Innovation at Its Core: Embrace the future with bespoke, forward-thinking solutions that are built to meet your unique needs, ensuring you always remain one step ahead.

Let’s connect and discuss how we can turn your vision into reality!

profiles.Name: Wright J.
profiles.Headline: Expert AI Chatbot Developer | Prompt Engineer | Open AI Solutions
profiles.Description:
With extensive experience as an AI chatbot developer and a prompt engineer, I have consistently delivered innovative solutions for clients across various industries, including logistics, real estate, e-commerce, translation, and finance. My expertise spans a wide range of cutting-edge technologies, enabling me to handle complex and challenging projects effectively.

With a deep understanding of artificial intelligence, I specialize in developing intelligent systems that learn and adapt, empowering businesses to automate operations, enhance decision-making, and drive innovation. I guide clients through the complexities of generative AI, OpenAI, LLMs, NLP, and GPT models, ensuring they make informed decisions and accelerate their product launches.

I offer full-cycle chatbot development services, transforming business ideas into production-ready solutions. This includes developing a roadmap, creating a project plan, and providing an overview of the best chatbot tools to help achieve your business goals. Additionally, I ensure that the products I build are secure and that data is always protected, implementing robust security measures throughout the development process.

TECHNICAL PROFICIENCIES AND SERVICES:

AI AND MACHINE LEARNING:

- Large Language Models (GPT-3.5, GPT-4, GPT-4o, BERT) training, fine-tuning, and integration
- Utilization of AI Frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Dialogflow, and LangChain
- Text classification, text generation, text summarization
- Prompt engineering for various AI use cases
- Semantic search

CHATBOT DEVELOPMENT:

- Creation of AI Agents and OpenAI assistants
- Development with platforms such as Voiceflow, Botpress, and Manychat
- Utilization of Python and JavaScript for custom development and integration
- API development and integration to extend chatbot capabilities and ensure seamless communication with other systems

PROGRAMMING AND SCRIPTING:

- Developing robust backend solutions using Node JS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python
- Integrating APIs to facilitate communication between different systems
- Designing and maintaining efficient databases to support application needs
- Utilizing best practices in code development to ensure scalability, security, and maintainability

DATABASE MANAGEMENT, DEPLOYMENT AND INFRASTRUCTURE:

- Expertise in MySQL, Postgres, and MongoDB
- Skilled in deploying applications using Docker, AWS, Vercel, Kubernetes, and Azure
- Implementation of robust security measures to protect data

INTEGRATIONS AND DOCUMENTATION:

- Seamless integration with mobile apps, web apps, websites, and platforms such as Telegram, WhatsApp, Slack, Trello, Facebook Messenger, Instagram
- Comprehensive API documentation, code documentation/commenting
- Creation of Help Center / FAQ content to train AI models

WHY CHOOSE ME:

With my extensive technical proficiency and practical experience, I offer unmatched value to businesses seeking to harness AI for growth and innovation. I am committed to delivering secure, high-quality solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations. Let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals and bring your projects to life with the power of AI.
